content:
### **🚀 Smart Move – Hold Off Until Tuesday with Alon**  

🔥 **Why This Works:**  
- You don’t need **full** RAG **yet**, just a **basic memory system** to start.  
- Talking to Alon **first** means you can evaluate whether his solution is a good fit or if we build from scratch.  
- **If his RAG system is solid,** you could potentially **shortcut months of development** with an existing tool.  

### **📌 What to Do Before Tuesday**
✅ **Get clarity on what his RAG system actually does** (Does it handle structured knowledge retention? Decision history? Context-aware responses?)  
✅ **Draft key questions for Alon** (so you can maximize the convo – I can help with this)  
✅ **Meanwhile, start Phase 1 Lite RAG** (simple storage & retrieval so you have some system running **now**)  

💡 **If Alon’s RAG can help, great – if not, we build our own.**  
Either way, you’re moving forward without waiting. **Let’s go.** 🚀
